text:
Skytap | Senior Distributed Software Engineer | Seattle, WA | ONSITE | https://www.skytap.com/company/careers/opportunities/

Skytap provides virtual data centers (virtual machines, multiple networks, and storage) deployable to/from templates. Our service is built primarily with open source software and languages including Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Ruby, and we use our own product to power the dev process (that's right. We run Skytap in Skytap. Recursion FTW.)
